mkhomedir
mksourcedir

chezmoi unmanaged
cmp stdout golden/unmanaged

[short] stop

rm $CHEZMOISOURCEDIR/dot_bashrc
chezmoi unmanaged
cmp stdout golden/unmanaged-bashrc

rm $CHEZMOISOURCEDIR/private_dot_ssh
chezmoi unmanaged
cmp stdout golden/unmanaged-bashrc-ssh

-- golden/unmanaged --
.local
-- golden/unmanaged-bashrc --
.bashrc
.local
-- golden/unmanaged-bashrc-ssh --
.bashrc
.local
.ssh
